<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Supertaster](/Feats.aspx?ID=2152) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 209 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
master in Perception

</column>

---

You have refined your palate and have a discerning sense of taste that can detect abnormalities in the flavor and texture of food and beverages. When eating food or drinking a beverage, you automatically attempt to identify the ingredients, which might alert you to the presence of alterations or additives, such as [poisons](/Traits.aspx?ID=126). The GM rolls a [secret](/Traits.aspx?ID=142) Perception check using the poison's level to determine the DC; on a success, you learn that the food or drink was poisoned, but not the specific poison used. 

If you lick or taste something while [Investigating](/Actions.aspx?ID=516) or attempting to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) to identify something, if the taste would provide relevant additional information (at the GM's discretion), you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your check.
name: Supertaster
